extendedInfo.description: Get the Caller Location(City,State) of Caller when Phone Ringing.Get Mobile Location of any mobile number and STD, ISD, PIN/ZIP Codes.No Internet Connection Required.Smart Contacts: Synced with Google contacts.It is add supported but does not collect your personal information.Please first Use and then Write Comments, If you have some issue you can send a mail at androiddeveloper1990@gmail.com to me , I will surely respond, and if you write in comments I will not able to respond.Track Any Mobile Number,Get Mobile Number Location, STD/ISD/PIN Codes of all cities in india. Get the Location from where a person has called you.Only for India Users.Many a time we get missed calls/calls /SMS from unknown number , we can use this app to find the location and service provider of caller.(without Internet Connection)Get the Telecom Circle (State / Metro) and the Operator of any mobile number by just entering first 4 digit of your Mobile Number.See the call logs with complete information like Service Provider and Location of each call received.It doesn't tell only the telecom circle but also tells which area that telecom circle includes. see the screenshot.Get the STD code of any city in India.Get the ISD code of all the countries in the word.Enter the STD code and get the city name.Enter the ISD code and get the Country name.App contains latest number series.It contains the STD code of all the Cities and ISD code of All countries.Smart Contacts:It may take little more time to load the contacts first time, after first time it will work smoothly.Note: The Operator shown here is the first assigned operator for MSC code. With mobile number portability in place, the number could have ported to some other operator. Numbers ported to other operator is still being shown as the first registered operator of the number.If the user is in roaming then the apps tells the home location.App shows location of mobiles of india only.

reviews.title: Excellent, and stands above the crowd. Indispensable!
reviews.comment: Ignore the junk remarks. I tried other call trackers but this one has unique features so had to search again and install it after formatting my Lava N400! This app let\'s you check the nos. Offline i.e. can check the contact list, call log etc. any time. Other apps work only during the call. Five stars of course!
